H0.text: Newton's theory of gravity had the greatest impact on the way humans heat their homes.

H1.text: Mendel's experiments with pea plants had the greatest impact on the way humans heat their homes.

H2.text: Franklin's experiments with electricity had the greatest impact on the way humans heat their homes.

H3.text: Darwin's research on the Galapagos islands had the greatest impact on the way humans heat their homes.
